title: Robots that spare warehouse workers the heavy lifting
description: Founded by MIT alumni, the Pickle Robot Company has developed machines that can autonomously load and unload trucks inside warehouses and logistic centers.
content: There are some jobs human bodies just werent meant to do. Unloading trucks and shipping containers is a repetitive, grueling task and a big reason warehouse injury rates are more than twice the natio… [+7044 chars]
